titleInfo.title: GRANUM ALBERTA: THEY HAVE LOTS TO [CROW] ABOUT AROUND HERE

mods:mods.note: Small illustration of a crow on the left side of the card, the right is filled with a typed message
Hello Sonny Are you still alive if so write and tell me Yours Truly D.L. Morrow Granum, Alta

Dear Folks:- I have just seen the Granum ex-hibit at the Dominion Fair, Calgary. Say, they must have a great district. Wheat goes as high as 60 bushel to the acre and from 30 to 40 is common. Oats yield from 40 to 100 bushel and barley 30 to 50 bushel. You should see the grand display of native and tame grasses and also clovers and alfalfa. Vegetables do well there. If you are in-terested write to the Sec. Board of Trade, Granum, Alta. Sincerely yours,
